automation_potential.reasoning: Rule drafting and example creation require human expertise. Compliance auditing and dashboard integration can be partially automated. File prefixing can be enforced via naming scripts.

Transcript translation is fully automatable (Ukrainian/Russian to English). Activity organization by timestamps is scriptable. Plans.md generation with priorities can be AI-automated. Tasks.md with step-by-step breakdowns can be AI-generated with templates. Manual review recommended for quality assurance.
Token counting and basic compression can be automated. Semantic preservation requires human judgment. Quality validation needs manual testing. Advanced compression techniques need AI expertise.

MCP extraction is highly automatable once credentials and endpoint specs are obtained. Normalization of IDs, titles, and tags can be scripted. Only initial setup and quality validation require human intervention.

File comparison, hash checking, and drift reporting are fully automatable. Setting up CI/MCP automation requires initial configuration effort but runs automatically afterward. Remediation suggestions can be automated with templates.

AI extraction of customer info is highly automatable. Peer-to-peer verification and evidence attachment (recordings, screenshots) require human workflow. Next tool connection logging can be semi-automated.

Downloading and format conversion can be automated. Adaptation to OA-Y's system requires human understanding of context and terminology differences. Pipeline integration is semi-automatable once transformation rules are defined.

Research prompt execution requires human judgment to interpret Gemini results, identify relevant patterns, and synthesize narrative connecting departments, actions, objects, and context. Output organization is partially automatable.

Entity structure creation is template-based. JSON file generation can be semi-automated. DEPARTMENT_GUIDE.md updates require understanding of department-specific account needs. Manual verification needed for account accuracy.

Configuration file editing can be automated. Troubleshooting Docker/Node.js issues requires human problem-solving. Testing and validation are semi-automatable. Environment-specific setup requires manual judgment.

Tool list compilation can be automated with web scraping. URL validation is automatable. Responsibility descriptions in Action + Object format can be AI-generated with templates. Manual review needed for accuracy and department-specific customization.
Scene structure can be templated. Character dialogue requires creative writing. Narration notes can be AI-assisted. Technical specifications need human expertise.

GitHub Actions setup is well-documented. YAML configuration is standardizable. Python scripting is automatable. API integration follows standard patterns. Manual effort only for initial setup and testing.

Classification rules can be automated with action keyword matching. Workflow template generation is automatable. Action library categorization can be scripted. Manual validation needed for edge cases and new action types.

File discovery can be automated with search tools. Document classification can be AI-assisted. Metadata extraction is automatable. Manual curation needed for quality assessment and relevance determination. Organizing into libraries requires human judgment.

Infographic template generation can be semi-automated with design tools. Narrative context and thumbnail component selection require human creativity and brand alignment. Task outcome extraction can be automated.

Creative design decisions require human expertise. Brand discovery needs client interaction. Color palette and typography selection involve aesthetic judgment. Guidelines documentation can be semi-automated with templates.

Requirements gathering requires human communication skills. Question formulation needs understanding of both design and development constraints. Designer-developer communication involves nuanced technical discussions. Client relationship management requires empathy and judgment. Documentation can be semi-automated with templates.

Boundary setting requires human negotiation skills. Client expectation management needs emotional intelligence. Working hours policy requires business judgment. Reporting frequency optimization requires understanding of client needs and team capacity. Communication can be templated but delivery requires personal touch.

Status data extraction from multiple sources can be automated. Discrepancy identification can be scripted with comparison logic. Correction recommendations can be automated with business rules. Manual verification needed for complex cases (on leave, part-time, project transitions). HR coordination requires human communication.
Design system creation requires deep design expertise. Component design is creative work. Documentation can be semi-automated. Design decisions require human judgment.
Landing page design requires creative expertise. Layout decisions need design judgment. Brand alignment requires human oversight. Developer handoff can be semi-automated.
UX design requires user research. Multi-role interfaces need complex interaction design. Adaptive design requires creative problem-solving. Client iteration involves human judgment.
